! cue export repeated.cue -o openapi:export.json
cmp stdout expect-stdout
cmp stderr expect-stderr

! cue eval repeated.cue --out openapi
cmp stdout expect-stdout
cmp stderr expect-stderr


-- expect-stderr --
info.title: conflicting values "test title 2" and "test title":
    ./repeated.cue:2:12
    ./repeated.cue:6:12
-- expect-stdout --
-- repeated.cue --
info: {
    title: "test title"
}

info: {
    title: "test title 2"
}
